name: Floppy Disks from Hell
description:
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ  

Help Floppy Disks to repair from the flames a broken cell phone due to a strange malfunction on a World scale!

A factory malfunction is sabotaging equipment all over the world,
Help Floppy Disks in his battle to repair a broken cell phone from the flames before it explodes!

If you run to win, you will help find a solution to this global threat.
Going from one side to another, avoiding difficulties, you reach the goals, advancing levels, repairing areas in the cell phone's platelets and chips.

ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ

A game for the whole family

*A runner with platform elements where Floppy Disks traverse the screen jumping platforms on their way to their target.

*Reach the finish line with the most Floppy Disks before the meter reaches zero and the phone doesn't explode.
